Class ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener<ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent>

    @Component
public class ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEventListener
extends Object
implements EventListener<ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent>
    Event donating that a manager granted themself management access to a topic.

    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

        public void handle(ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent event)

        Is called by the EventDispatcher when the observed event was fired.
